Organisers of next year's Eurovision Song Contest have warned visitors not to book accommodation at over-inflated prices during the event.

articles.title: ITV Who Wants To Be A Millionaire's Jeremy Clarkson left gobsmacked as contestant breaks 14-year record - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: The record was set in 2008 before being beaten on Saturday night
articles.content: A 14-year record was broken on Who Wants To Be A Millionaire on Saturday night (October 8) which left host Jeremy Clarkson gobsmacked. The tense gameshow, where contestants compete for a top prize of… [+2140 chars]

articles.author: Jacqueline Lindenberg
articles.title: Colin Farrell makes SURPRISE cameo alongside host Brendan Gleeson during Saturday Night Live - Daily Mail
articles.description: Colin Farrell made a surprise cameo appearance on Saturday Night Live wearing a large mustache as a 'disguise' alongside guest host and fellow Irish actor, Brendan Gleeson.
articles.content:
Saturday Night Live was hosted by renowned Irish actor, Brendan Gleeson, to kick off the second episode of the sketch-comedy's 48th season.
